content: repeat for second sleeve weave in all loose ends closure options i closed the sweater by making two lengths of crochet chain 6 long and sewing them on as ties see picture you may work buttonholes in the front placket if desired working the rib section as k1 yo k2tog p1 on each buttonhole row alternatively you could sew on ties made of ribbon or i-cord customization make sleeves longer or shorter add cuffs change the length of the body or work borders in seed stitch or garter stitch for a different look have fun
